website_summaries.verdict: The best budget basketball to have on hand for practice at home or outside.
pros: Can buy multiple basketballs for less
Heavy leather and stitching make the ball appropriate for both indoor and outdoor use
Ball is easy to inflate with the appropriate needle and hand or electric pump
cons: Will last longer with indoor play versus outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: Looks good; feels good; no effect on whether or not you are good, which is a good thing in a ball
customer_reviews.text: Got this in a size 6 as a first ball for my tween daughter just developing an interest in basketball. She felt like she was getting a serious, primo ball, and I felt like I was getting a good deal. So far neither of us has changed our mind. Would have been nice if it also magically made me a passable ball handler and/or shooter, but I don't hold it against the ball that I still suck.
customer_reviews.author: 2cents

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ball
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ball! It's nice and bouncy, has a great grip, and the smaller women's NCAA size helps me gain so much control over the men's official size. It adds so much pleasure to shooting hoops! I looked and tried to many basketballs before setting on this. I purchased 2 by mistake and was going to return the other one, but I like it so much, its great to have a second great ball for others to use. A+
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for this price range
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ball to use indoors only. It's well-made and has no signs of wear after using it a number of times. It holds air just fine, and it feels like it's made to last. My only issue would be that despite being called "tack soft" it really isn't soft. It's made to handle the rigors of outdoor courts so I'm not surprised. Just don't expect a ball that feels like an indoor only ball (like the Baden Elite or Wilson Evolution).
customer_reviews.author: DJA

customer_reviews.title: Okay ball. Didn't arrive new!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good outdoor ball. Not that great inside for playing. However, Amazon for some reason didn't ship us a new ball. Looks like it was played somewhere before sending to us. Not nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D

customer_reviews.title: Similar to a game ball, not the cheaper rubber balls
customer_reviews.text: Got this so we can take our own ball to the gym and not use theirs. Works much better than some of the older balls. We keep checking the air and fill it with a little hand pump as needed. Bounces well and good feel to the ball, similar to a game ball not the rubbery feel balls.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: Ball came completely flat. My daughter has her first game tomorrow and needed an inflated ball now I gotta go find a pump to blow it up. Quality control should have bounced it before they boxed it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The ball I received will not hold it's air. I have played basketball my entire life - and have owned more basketballs than I can count; I have never had to pump up a ball so many times; it's a shame. I purchased the cheaper "Street" version for my son at the same time, and his is fine... Guess you cannot count on quality anymore.
customer_reviews.author: burleyaz

customer_reviews.title: Not outdoor worthy
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this Indoor/Outdoor ball does not hold up. After 2 months of driveway shoot-arounds (maybe 4 hours total play time in the life of the ball), the panels of the ball are peeling away from the body. No rain, no moisture, ball is stored indoors. The feel of the faux leather is good, but the build quality is very poor. It could be that I got a flawed ball and this is not indicative of all. Hey Spalding/Amazon...how about an exchange?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor ball for the money by far!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite outdoor ball for shooting! I go through one of these balls a year. The concrete takes its toll and by years end the ball has become significantly lighter from the leather wearing down! I definitely love the tack on this ball!
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Sweet feel in the hand
customer_reviews.text: I made so many three pointers I thought I was gonna get drafted. Sweet feel in the hand. Nice grooves. Bouncy bouncy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce and nice texture
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor/indoor ball and although I've only used it one time so far, it's definitely feels like it's going to be a good basketball for a while. Really happy with it after playing earlier today!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: excellent this ball, I acquired it to play street basketball and as this is to play indoor / outdoor, it is of good quality I quite liked I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amin EspinosaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product came in deflated and when I put air in it after a couple of hours it slowly starts to deflate. Every time I’m going to use it I need to put air in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor play / practice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be used indoors only, but so far has stayed inflated & the tactile surface helps young players feel the ball connection more strongly & helps better dribbling practice
customer_reviews.author: s f.

customer_reviews.title: Wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good and feels good for a couple uses then it wears fast and for the price it should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: Really good ball. Feels like a very nice indoor ball and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Some deficiencies but you get what you pay for, it works for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SachiKoKo

customer_reviews.title: defective ball was replaced, but company asked me to pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: i received a ball with a leak. The company did replace it, but i had to pay for shipping - i feel this is inappropriate for a product that was defective straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Uneven ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball was uneven upon arrival, it bounced unevenly and had a noticeable side swing to it or un-evenness, like an egg almost.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quailty
customer_reviews.text: You Gotta break it in but this one has a nice grip, I play about 5x a Week for 2 hours Outdoors and this ball lasted a solid 3 months before I bought a second one. I like the tack soft grip of this ball but if you play outdoors on dusty courts it can get a little slippery but understandable. But the Soft touch is great and feels like the expensive indoor game balls. It does its job so far Im very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: love this ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. It feels great and professional. First time playing with it, it felt brand new straight out the box. After about a week of playing, everybody wants to use my ball for games. It feels good that your ball becomes the game ball out of all the other balls but I feel bad when its time for me to leave the gym. lol...Jerry Ayers
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap but has good feels playing outdoor. It did lose a bit of the grip after continuous daily use after one month, which is expected.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cai

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Poor grip. Same as an old balls grip. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Adam B. Hochman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good soFt feel. Balance is a little plastic but better than others
customer_reviews.author: Zach Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Roundish
customer_reviews.text: My basketball arrived extremely over inflated in a box with no product packaging. I could care less about the packaging but thought it was odd. the thing i do care about is the shape of my basketball. this thing has at least one bulge that I would attribute to overinflation.
customer_reviews.author: K-BOB

customer_reviews.title: Item Received Exactly As Listed & Described.
customer_reviews.text: Item received exactly as listed & described. Quick reliable shipping. Attentive & Trustworthy Seller! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arakawa

customer_reviews.title: Volts
customer_reviews.text: So soft on your hands, use indoors all The time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Forte

customer_reviews.title: Warped ball
customer_reviews.text: Got sent a used warped ball. Two flat spots on the ball. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable even on aggregate concrete
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basketball for outdoors, feels like an indoor ball, and is very durable. Great for my son!!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Good bb
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He uses it everyday to play outdoors and the ball is holding up pretty well with respect to air pressure and appearance. The gold embossing is gone for the most part but overall still has a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to my pick-up games at the gym. It was instantly everyone’s favorite. Has a very good feel shooting and dribbling.
customer_reviews.author: D Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor ball for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball that will hold up well if you stick to using it indoors. It will quickly lose its soft/tacky feel though if used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shu

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: kinda slick and slippery. Its fine but not real good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mac

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball
customer_reviews.text: My 11 y/o basketball player dribbles this to and from school everyday and it holds up great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: NBA Feel
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this basketball and the feel of the soft material is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: GREG HARPER

customer_reviews.title: good ball
customer_reviews.text: Good ball for my 12 year old son. Grip and bounce are good.
customer_reviews.author: bryan05

customer_reviews.title: i didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t like the way the ball chance colors on after 3 months of having a
customer_reviews.author: lawrencersykes

customer_reviews.title: Decent Basketball
customer_reviews.text: It had really good reviews so maybe I was expecting a lot out of a cheap basketball. The cushion and feel of the ball is great but the ball I received has a few issues. I have to pump the ball every few weeks (only casual play maybe twice a week) also the ball warped really fast. When I got the ball it seemed a little warped but after 2 days you could tell the ball wasn't round but it's not warped to the point where it's unplayable. instead of a circular it's slightly Elliptical
customer_reviews.author: jimyang29

customer_reviews.title: somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i should have bought a rubber ball for outdoor. Composite is not that good
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality basketball. This is the second basketball we have purchased for outdoor use. very durable
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great price, Still bouncing and held up after three years
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a couple uses...don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This ball has only been used a couple of times and it is already falling apart. Really poor quality, very surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great set, student tested.
customer_reviews.text: Came pumped up! Sure I topped them off, but nice that they came pumped up. You dont want to have them not inflated for long its bad for them. Good product. Picked this up for my basketball team, and they are loving them.
customer_reviews.author: pH 14

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible not great
customer_reviews.text: The ball is decent, definitely better than a rubber street ball, but the tack soft actually feels kind of slick to me at times.Maybe it needs to be broken in a little, but for the money the Zi/0 Excel ball is much better. **The tack soft might work better outside, I'll admit I have only used it indoor.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, nice touch
customer_reviews.text: I finally have no excuse not to dribble like Kyrie Irving.
customer_reviews.author: S N

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball. I use is playing outdoor B-Ball and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball. I use is playing outdoor B-Ball and also use it playing indoors at the gymn.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Really disapppointed. This ball lasted just a couple months--no more than 20 sessions--before springing a slow, unfixable leak. I advise against buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grebe

customer_reviews.title: 2 months 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this basketball everyday for 2 months on a concrete garage floor. Besides basic wear and tear, it's everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland Surrey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball looks and feels as good as balls I've paid 3 times more for. It looks like a leather basketball and has that good feeling grip of leather, but it's not so you can play indoors, or outdoors without worrying about wearing it down. I can't wait to get it on the court. The ball came fully inflated which is a great plus. And, with Amazon Prime's free, 2 day shipping, I got a great basketball under $20. I can't believe it! I highly recommend this product for basketball lovers of all ages and skill levels. Have fun! I know I will.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mathis Enterprises, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Decent ball.  A bit slippery on side where the NBA logo is printed.
customer_reviews.text: This ball gets nicer as you break it in more. When I first got it, it was only a so-so impression. The grip is pretty nice, but the ball feels a bit harder than usual for the ones I pick up in its price range. Now it's been a couple of months of use (about 6 times a month), it's been well broken in and feels very nice when dribbling and shooting now. The grip is holding up well, although I only play indoors. One down side to this ball is that it's pretty slippery where the NBA logo is printed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Will be okay indoors but will start to deteriorate after a few plays outside.
customer_reviews.author: david shimonov

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great ball but just came in box with no realpreaentation but that didn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: A fine product
customer_reviews.text: This basketball has a great feel. I think it is one of the best basketball products in this price range. My daughters love to use them and prefer to use them over the basketballs they use in their team games.
customer_reviews.author: repaso

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality -do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After using for a few days outdoors, the synthetic leather started peeling. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ray -Sacramento , CA

customer_reviews.title: Check it right when you get it
customer_reviews.text: Came in an first time I played with it it was lopsided. Not sure if it sat to long or what.
customer_reviews.author: Del Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basketball...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson who is in the third grade. The ball is very tacky, just what kids need when learning to shoot properly. I would highly recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: hawks22

customer_reviews.title: Good feel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good feel. My son likes it. We use it for indoor only so I expect it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: AusDevAri

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball For The Money
customer_reviews.text: This ball is better than many balls that cost twice as much. Very soft feel, wide grooves, great for kids. Been coaching youth basketball for several years - my ball bag is full of these now and gave away everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ball Works Nicely
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, it felt great. I enjoyed playing outside with this box. After two days though, the ball lost its grip. This is because dirt covers the leather. A solution to this is that you should wash the ball every now and then. When I washed it, it felt as good as it felt right out of the box! I would recommend buying this ball.
customer_reviews.author: ITVTI

customer_reviews.title: Best Ball
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball best one I have used. Love the grip and the weight is perfect don't have any cons for it makes an awesome sound when you snap the bottom of the net.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... mean but these balls were very slick and not easy to handle because of it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what Tack Soft is supposed to mean but these balls were very slick and not easy to handle because of it. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Officer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic Spalding basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what the complaints about grip are for seeing as a leather basketball creates a feel on the hand, over time. Great outdoor ball. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marc J. Driftmeyer

customer_reviews.title: The ball looses pretty quick and the grip wears away fast if used ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give it 3.5 stars. The ball looses pretty quick and the grip wears away fast if used outdoors. Otherwise its an excellent ball, best I found in my price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amad Erasu

customer_reviews.title: ... would say this a OK outside ball but feels better inside. The main thing that I didn't like ...
customer_reviews.text: I would say this a OK outside ball but feels better inside. The main thing that I didn't like about it was the weird color it would change into when scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ball. He likes it for indoor use most of the time because it can get weathered outside and lose some of its grip.
customer_reviews.author: The ranch

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: The ball looked and felt great but after just one night already lost air so I returned it. I may have just gotten one bad ball in a batch but this was enough for me to opt for a different ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Not good for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: This ball seemed great when it was new, but the surface wears off pretty quickly if used outdoors. Probably would hold up longer if only used on an indoor court, but not recommended for outside.
customer_reviews.author: ADM_NW

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball. The grip isn't too much but just enough to play comfortably. It just feels good to play with.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his ball. Great grip and nice handling. I recommend this to anyone especially for someone wanting a great gripping ball
customer_reviews.author: A. Sunclades

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball cover wear off after 2 plays only ! Dont think it worth the cost I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Erez Rachmil

customer_reviews.title: The grip is good on it
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent ball. The grip is good on it. The only thing is that it is a bit small for a 29.5" ball. I compared it to a few other basketballs that have and this one isn't quite a big. It is definitely not a ladies ball but is just shy of a man ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Intermediate size basetball.
customer_reviews.text: My niece just started playing basketball. Great first basketball for youths.
customer_reviews.author: H. Joo

customer_reviews.title: works like a basketball!!!
customer_reviews.text: because it is a basketball! haha, i wanted a women's bball and this is the correct size, it bounces well, and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Werth

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Good transition ball from a size 3 to a regulation size ball. We use as indoor ball only to maintain the grip. Recommend doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: H Family

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy :)
customer_reviews.text: I liked this basketball. The grip and bounce is all good. Only problem I had was the color started wearing off. But other than that a fantastic ball XD
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: great grip - good quality
customer_reviews.text: 28.5" girls basketball. tried to find a good, quality ball at decent price. this fits tehe bill. good job. a
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 9 year old for team play, great quality and a great indoor ball, as always... way to go Spalding!
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Decent Ball for The price
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent ball for the price. The grip does wear over time, so you need to be cognizant of that. For a shootaround and casual game ball, I think it's good. Look elsewhere if you're wanting gripage.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalo

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: The ball feels good but it deflates by itself pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size great for Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size is perfect for my Grandchildren. They can handle the size of this ball much better than the regular size basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Starter ball for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Of course he is going to love it at age 9. His first indoor ball, glad I could get it for him
customer_reviews.author: Threetooltrader

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: All of my grandkids loved this ball. It has a good feel, like the balls they will use in school sports. The composite surface is durable and weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Haselwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My boy loves it! Good grip. Holds air very well.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Grandson said COOL
customer_reviews.text: The basketball was ordered and paid for by my grandson. He is pleased. Order arrived as estimated. Basketball has not been left outside yet so must be the right one!
customer_reviews.author: Dodi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good to play on the street it gets slippery
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Romero

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my 10 year old daughter who plays in a competitive league. She says that this ball is easy to grip and believes that it enables her to score more baskets. All of her teammates are jealous of this great ball and want to use it during practices and scrimmages.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL BRADSHAW

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my son turning 11. We use it outside and it has a good grip and seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor basketball
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a lot of indoor basketballs and we love this one. It is high quality and durable. It is my son's favorite ball.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Jackson

customer_reviews.title: great ball. feels alittle lighter
customer_reviews.text: i like this basketball. has good grip and a great bound. to me it feels lighter than a normal basketball
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had the basketball for only a month and it won't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Another Good Bounce for your Money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, packaged extremely well, well made grandkids love it. Looks like it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! Kids love it and it's official size they play with. Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Transaction!
customer_reviews.text: Seller worked very well with me, and balls were exactly as advertised. Shipping was quick!s
customer_reviews.author: BBEAW

customer_reviews.title: Sports nut
customer_reviews.text: good basketball we have been buying spalding basketballs for year best suited for indoor use will hold up much better
customer_reviews.author: spidermange

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for kids, easy to dribble and rebound
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old uses this for his youth basketball league and really likes it. It seems softer than some of the other balls in this price range. He says it's easier to dribble than the other balls we have or his team uses. We have only used it inside because it's winter in the Chicago area but it seems like a ball that would hold up well outside also.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Decent basketball for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent basketball for the price, its tacky with a nice grip, but kind of light. I would spend a little more for a better quality ball, but I won't complain because I didn't want to spend that extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Its a good ball. The thing is
customer_reviews.text: Its a good ball. The thing is, here in Brazil they not so used to it but i know of its quality myself. Plus, some courts here arent that good hence they can be a potential threat to the ball.. But im realy satisfied with the product! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new one for my son every year ...
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Lasts a long time inside. Maybe 1 year outside before it looks rough. I coach and these make good practice balls for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good basketball ball. It is preferable to play indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Milan Ernesto Robles

product_meta.title: Spalding NBA Tack-Soft Indoor/Outdoor Basketball
feature_bullets: Official NBA size and weight: Size 7, 29.5 inches
Designed for indoor and outdoor play
